attributes.action: ensure all Non-British criminals are Extradited.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Convicted criminals of foreign origin should be extradited as a mater of course. By their own choice they have given up the right to remain under the UK's rights and protections. We, the british tax payer, should not be expected to fund a prison stay or appeals on their behalf. After all we pay more towards prisoner welfare than we do to support our senior citizens’. A real vote loser.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
